name: Michael Moore
text: I had some bad experience with amateur companies that tried and failed to take care of the cleaning of my vintage upholstery. This company is the only one I am willing to work with at this point, since they know exactly what they are doing. With their upholstery cleaning services, I am sure that I will enjoy my collection for years to come, and that is the reason why I would like to recommend them.

name: Anna Hansen
text: After submitting a request, Ambassador Cleaning CO responded very quickly. I`m so far very happy with the cleaning service, that this company offers and will review again once the work is complete.

name: Lakeshia Ware
text: Great commercial cleaner in Montgomery, AL. Always on time and tidy. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Tingley
text: Very professional commercial cleaning service.

name: C DeLoach
text: listed phone number does not belong to company

name: Gertrude Crowe
text: Great cleaning services

name: Amanda Bolle
text: My experience with Luke's pressure washing was positive all the way around.  The technician arrived on time and was friendly, I wanted to adopt him.  He did a wonderful job and now my driveway sparkles!  I plan to have them back soon to do my windows and patio.

name: Charlotte Sommersby
text: Luke has done numerous jobs for me from home to business. Each time he consistently does an excellent job and in a fast turn around. Highly recommend and his pricing is very competitive.  No job too small......

name: meagan Howell
text: Luke does great work! Highly recommend him!

name: Mark Herrick
text: Sid does a great job of getting a lot of work done in 2 hours.  She is always agreeable to work on areas that I point out that are not on the normal list of duties.  Sid is a pleasant person to work with and is always on time.  Highly recommended.

name: Joanna Futch
text: I have had several ladies clean our home -- Vanessa, Christina, and Irma.  They all do a good job, and I am grateful for the help to keep my home clean.  They have always been respectful and careful with our belongings.  I appreciate that they are bonded and insured as I have had some issues with cleaning services in the past.  Thank you, ladies!

name: Talent At Brickhouse
text: Do NOT Use Merry Maids. Charged my 70 year old mother over $500 to clean her house after a kitchen redo. The floors were still dirty, drywall dust still everywhere, baseboards weren’t done. Tried to get the owner to call me that hasn’t even happened. I am contacting corporate as each is franchised owed. Do not use this company! Rocket city maids are a great option! Pictures are of kitchen AND bathroom floors after they mopped that day and furniture after they dusted

name: Wesley L
text: I rely on Merry Maids to keep my house tidy and clean.  The people who come to my home do an excellent job; I'm grateful for the service I receive.

name: Advisory Board Member X3
text: This service is my go to for my properties. So glad they offer great service and quality without the crazy price-tag!

name: millerad76
text: Really happy with the service!  Denise and ShaQuita were both very pleasant to interact with.  Did a great job.  Wish I hadn't waited so long to give them a call!

name: Natalie Jay
text: My cleaner was on time, did a good job, and was very professional as well as courteous. She did a thorough job even though it meant staying a little longer. Overall, we were please with our first experience.

name: Erin Sutherland
text: I liked the first lady who came and I assumed that she would return. The second time a younger more chatty, less professional girl showed up and I was not as satisfied. I would like to get the first lady back and have her each time.

name: Conrad Family
text: I am a very big fan of Merry Maids! I like the cinnamon smell and the sparkling restrooms. They do something miraculous to our children’s play area too just by tidying up. Thanks a bunch!

name: Susan Bridges
text: We have been very pleased with Vanessa's work.  She is fast but thorough and always very cheerful and friendly.

name: Jessie Kelley
text: Merry Maids is so thorough.....the house is always spotless. They are so kind and consider and do a wonderful job! I highly recommend them!

name: mkblady
text: This was my first time using Merry Maids & I was very impressed! My first contact was with Denise & she was so professional & very nice a few days later, a young lady named Jordan came to clean for me & I have to be honest,  my house was a total wreck! My house hasn't been this clean since I first moved in some years ago. Thank you so much to Jordan and Denise for making this experience a great one, because trying to clean this house was definitely no walk in the park. Thank you ladies ! Dawn B.

name: Karen Colvin
text: Okay, but I paid extra for a deep cleaning and I still had to sweep my floors when I got home. Baseboards and windowsills were not wiped. The toilet was not scrubbed well. It was ok for a basic cleaning, but not deep cleaning.

name: Jim Hennessy
text: Really good service, have to keep trying to find the right person, but worth the money here in Alabama. The people who clean awesome. I am not sure the owners really explain what the terms mean in the sense of cleaning.  Like I said, they get the dirt. I gave never experienced a deep clean yet. Even though I am charged for 2.

name: Tracey Zumbach
text: Meet Maids is flexible with my schedule and willing to accommodate my requests. I appreciate that my house is clean and y’all try to focus on a specific place each visit.

name: Diane Shertz
text: Did a great job. Thank you

name: Kristi A
text: Enjoyed service while we lived in Toney. It took awhile to find someone who was consistent in the cleaning and we requested the same person to come each time. Once we moved however they seemed very nonchalant in keeping our business. It was hard to get a response when I wanted to start service again and then no response at all.

name: Willie Malone
text: Maria cleans our home.  She is courteous, professional and very thorough.  Not only does Maria do a great job cleaning she is very pleasant, always on time, and  pays close attention to the details we expect. The Merry Maid staff is also very accommodating and willing to work with our schedule when needed.  Thanks Merry Maids for many years of excellent service.  Maria certainly is a great asset.

name: Anna Henson
text: I am posting for my mother, Gaylor Miller...Denise cleans her home and does an excellent job every time.  She is courteous, professional and thorough.  My mother couldn't be more pleased with her Merry Maids experience.

name: Ellen Bader
text: Lindsey was the young lady who cleaned my house and the rooms were immaculate.  Thank you.

name: Elesha Maynard
text: I have had my house cleaned twice so far with Merry Maids- Huntsville.  They were prompt, courteous, and fast.  But most importantly, they were thorough.   For one of the cleanings, I was home, and they took care to work around a toddler who needed to nap. I was pleasantly surprised at how much the team could accomplish in just a short amount of time.  My house looked and smelled amazing when they left!

name: A B
text:
After less than satisfying experiences with several other local home cleaning services in the area, I have been with Merry Maids for about a year now and could not be happier. The office staff have been very accommodating to any schedule changes I have needed to make (vacation, need extra clean for a party, etc). The prices are very reasonable for the area as well.
While all of the cleaning staff that have visited my home have been great, April in particular has been outstanding.  She is very professional, always pleasant to interact with, and great with my three dogs. After she has cleaned my home, there is not a dog hair in sight!

name: Family Morris
text: Lindsay is thoughtful, thorough, cheerful and very conscientious.

name: Thomas Park
text:
I am very pleased with Merry Maids. The cleanings are incredibly thorough. Victoria, and all the other maids I've met, do a wonderful job.  The office staff is always accommodating when it comes to scheduling changes.  I definitely recommend Merry Maids to anyone looking for cleaning services.

Update:  It's been over a year since the original review.  I am still very impressed with the service with the staff and the services they provide.  I still highly recommend Merry Maids.

name: Jack Geren
text: Local office is easy to deal with. Service has been great.

name: Nickie Purser
text: does a great job every time, glad tovhave her here to clean ur home. no complaints what so ever. perfect, every time.

name: Denis Bergquist
text: Been using MM for eight years - the maids sent in are always friendly and efficient, and the office staff is very supportive of scheduling changes. A big plus is for the early visits the supervisor visits a few times to get feedback and make sure any of our concerns are addressed, and then from time to time we get a call asking how things are going, We get rotating crews of one or two every other week - Tracy and Denise are great!

name: Tyler Scott
text: Everything was very easy to set up. Ladies were on time and did an amazing job cleaning. Felt great to come home to a clean house.

name: Fred Curtis
text: Merry Maids arrive on time, do excellent work, and are flexible if we need to change the monthly schedule

name: Walter Bouldin
text: Excellent service. We have been using Merry Maids bi-weekly  for over a year, and are very pleased with the results. All personnel have been courteous and professional, as well as efficient. Visits go quickly because they work briskly, with all the necessary tools. Not much turnover, so the people are familiar with what needs to be done. Front office is pleasant and accommodating with requests for changes in schedule.

name: Teresa Montgomery
text: Lisa is wonderful.  She has cleaned our home for several times now and is always kind, courtesy and professional.  We are pleased!

name: Marion Shelman
text: I have been using Merry Maids for 2 years and I love them.  They are very accommdating and have their trained cleaners train new ones so they know how to truly clean a house.  I have used other cleaning services and they do not know how to clean properly.  April is my girl and she always brings someone.  She is very attentive to details and to my needs.  I truly love her for all that she does.  She will even take care of me when I am ill.  I recently had total knee replacement and she fetched things I needed.

name: Katie Wilson
text: My house was so clean and smelled so good! I was gone the whole time so I do not know what products they used. It was literally better than any gift to walk in my home so clean and knowing I could trust the precious hands loving my home like family! Thank you so much! I loved it so much I signed up for the once a month service. I believe it is investing value in my home and family, as well as giving skilled "crafts-women" the opportunity to use their gifted hands and amazing work ethic at our house. We are blessed by the time and energy they put into their job. We greatly appreciate Merry Maids and I am thankful for the opportunity to express my gratitude! See you soon!

name: Julie Williams
text: Merry Maids has been here twice now and have done a great job cleaning. After trying a few other companies that didn’t understand “clean”, isn’t just wiping over everything, it was a relief to have Hope come and do what I can’t. Thank you

name: Shana Gunn
text: The ladies at Merry Maids are professional and know how to clean. Melissa was a joy to work with regarding our estimate, questions and overall concerns about how everything would flow. We like that we have the same dedicated crew for each visit. Thankful we have their help in keeping our home clean. Don't know what we would do without their hard work and awesome staff.

name: Mike Leotta
text: 1st cleaning was awful, the lady didn't wipe down the counters and didn't even mop. They also only send 1 person to clean a whole house, unlike the merry maids in Virginia who would send two. We called them the next day and cancelled. We then hired Two Maids and a Mop, who came out the next day and actually cleaned. Oh and Merry Maids overcharged us by about 60 dollars. Don't bother hiring Merry Maids, unless you just want some stranger to come into your house, clean nothing and leave a note saying they're glad you hired them and welcome to your clean house. Ha!

name: Rachel Baines
text: Jessica does a great job for us. No only is it great to have a clean house, put she is so pleasant and nice. They are always willing to work with our changing schedule. It's nice to work with a company that sincerely appreciates it's customers.

name: Stacy Hedden
text: Loved the two ladies you sent to my house!  They were so thorough.  My house hasn't been this clean in a long time!  So thankful for this service!!  Can't wait until they come back again!

name: Graham Brown
text: The ladies come once a month. They work without breaks and get things done.  Excellent job.

name: Lisa Evans
text: Today was my first experience with Merry Maids Huntsville and I loved it!!  Tracy showed up right on time and was very friendly and personable.  She did a great job on my house!  It looks and smells amazing!!  I would definitely recommend them and have them come again!!

name: Tre Pullins
text: They did a great first job with the deep cleaning ... way better than I could have ever done. Keep up that quality of work and I’ll be a long term customer.

name: Elizabeth Bergquist
text: We love having Denise clean our home! She goes above and beyond what we had hoped. Also, the company is generally good about letting us know changes in routine and introducing new team members to me - which super helpful for me since I have Asperger's.

name: Robin Stuart
text: Great job with attention to detail. We love our Merry Maid. Denise's cleaning is very thorough and she has a great attitude.

name: Nancy Bucher
text: I have been enjoying the wonderful cleaning service from Merry Maids for almost 10 years. They always do a great job keeping my home clean and comfortable. The maids are professional, courteous, and very friendly. The office personnel are excellent - customer satisfaction is clearly their number 1 priority. I have recommended Merry Maids to my friends and I recommend them to you!

name: Chelsey Fann
text: As a single mom of 3 kids, I have fell in love with the whole staff of Merry Maids. They have worked with my immensely busy schedule and have helped with so much more when I was desperately catching up after a divorce. I since then moved and carried these ladies with me. It is so nice to depend on them and have them be so understanding of my situation and the changes that come with it. Their customer service cannot be beat elsewhere, nor their prices.  The work that they do on my newest place is amazing to come home to with my 3 children. It helps me teach my kiddos how nice it is to work as a team to keep things clean in our home. Merry Maids have become a part of my team and support in this area of my life. Thank you, Merry Maids for all of your hard work!

name: Shannon Healy
text: Denise showed up early both times. She was polite, professional,  and friendly! She did a very thorough job cleaning, and met all of my expectations.  I would be happy to recommend Merry Maids of Huntsville,  and Denise, to all of my friends and family!

name: Stacey Ann Chavez
text: I’m very happy with the service.

name: Mary Ellen Pollard
text: Every .single. corner of the house was spotless! The ladies that came we're super friendly and efficient. They even linedy son's stuffed animals up on his bed in a cute way. Those little extras make every dime worth it.

name: Ellise Adams
text: I needed a new home cleaning service and today Merry Maids came to my house for the first time. I'm so happy with their service! April and Brooklyn were thorough and diligent and prompt and respectful of my home. They were so wonderful. I feel so grateful that I found this service!!!

name: PB Elliott
text: Very through, thoughtful and careful! I wrote this review 8 months ago. I am hear to let you know that I could not survive without Maria! She is still very through, thoughtful and careful! Thank you Maria! Peggy

name: Denise Vickers
text: My house was a wreck. I hired Merry Maids to do a deep cleaning. One lady showed up alone. I was skeptical she would be able to complete the job on her own in one day. She did a fantastic job. It felt so good to come home to a beautifully cleaned home. Thank you Merry Maids!

name: CI_1877
text: I so enjoy having Merry Maids clean my house every two weeks. Maria does an awesome job and pays special attention to a different area each visit. This service has really freed up my time! Love the company.

name: John Lewis
text: I have been a Merry Maids customer on a biweekly basis for a number of years, and I've always been extremely pleased with their service. I am typically away from my house when they come, and returning home to a thoroughly clean house is always a pleasure. When I have occasionally made special requests, they have always followed through. Although the particular cleaning personnel varies, they seem to pass information along so that the results are consistent. I recommend them highly.

name: Perry Newton
text:
Maria does a superb cleaning job.  She is very professional and conscientious.  House looks and smells great.  Merry Maids are very accommodating with scheduling and are always on time to do job.
Sherry Newton

name: James Kirsch
text: We have been using MM for over a year now have been very pleased.  They are very courteous and through and get the house cleaned very quickly.  The office is very easy to work with and have made adjustments to the schedule when we needed to.  Norma is our usual maid and has been a joy to work with.

name: Leah Cunningham
text: Caroline did an excellent job, very thorough and conscientious. Also appreciate Victoria and her professional attitude and attentive customer service. We have used another agency in town for several years but have found Merry Maids to be superior. Thank you!

name: Stephen Walls
text: My bathrooms were spotless and Merry Maids went above and beyond the typical dust, vacuum, mop you get from others. They cleaned my blinds, doors, windows, cabinets, appliances, and all sorts of stuff we rarely clean on our own. They make our lives easier and allow us to do more of the things we love.

name: Rebecca Oxford
text:
We have had good service from Merry Maids (thanks to all who have helped!), and yesterday we had fabulous service from Maria. Without being asked, she efficiently handled many little tasks that could have easily been overlooked. She washed the inside of the microwave, disposed of the paper from the shredder, sorted out my husband's (Cliff Stocking's) items, and helped me straighten up my massively confused study after I finished writing a book. She was also masterful in handling the big tasks.  We appreciate all the help from our wonderful Merry Maids visitors over the years, and we are happy with Maria's initiative and intelligence.
Thanks, Rebecca Oxford and Clifford Stocking

name: RACHEL JOHNSON
text: I would not recommend Merry Maids to my worst enemy. I can assure you that everyone that commented below has no idea how Merry Maids construct there business. This is one of the hardest jobs I have ever had in my life. You clean any where from four to five houses daily. You work so hard to the point that when you get home you don't even have the energy to complete personal/simple tasks. Simply tasks like taking a shower, cooking and cleaning for you family or even going out to a movie with your kids. Its pretty sad how they treat there employees. At the time I lost over 50 pounds working so hard and became very sick. I also lost a love one and didn't even get any condolences from the owners of the company. When I was there they were barely paying minimum wage. A customer might pay $120.00 to get Merry Maids to clean there home. The person that has to go and clean your home will make about 20.00 to 25.00. I could take you any where from 3 to 4 hours to clean a home. To me that does add up compared to the work you have to do. If a customer calls and complains about there cleaning. Merry Maids would make the cleaning free for the customer. And the person that cleaned your home with get written up and wont get paid anything for cleaning your home and will have to go out and clean it again for FREE! Something about that just doesn't add up. This company is family owned so they only care about themselves and not there employees. There are so many other company's  that you can give your money to and they will do a much better job than Merry Maid!!!!  (Maid Pro, Two Maids & A Mop, The Maids, Office Pride, Hard Hat Cleaning, White Glove Cleaning Service, Denise Dollar Home Cleaning, Elite Cleaning Service, A-One Cleaning Service,  Imagann Cleaning Service, Housekeepers Inc., Maid Green Cleaning Service, etc.) All the above cleaning service listings are in your local area. You do not have to give you hard earned money to Merry Maids anymore. A company that cares for no one but themselves is a company waiting to fail. And a company that knows how to treat there employees will grow.

name: Joy DuBose
text: Denise does a wonderful job cleaning my home. She is very professional, neat, and careful with my things. I really appreciate her hard work and I'm sure the Merry Maid company is proud to have her as one of their representatives.

name: Leigh Hensel
text: We have been pleased with our experience with Merry Maids.  Norma is very nice, professional, on time and we are always happy with the cleanliness of the house.  We especially like the surprise scented linen spray during the holidays...nice touch.

name: Jennifer Greer
text: Merry Maids did an amazing job cleaning our house. It was wonderful coming home to everything being clean and fresh. We will have them take care of all of our cleaning needs in the future!

name: Philip Busk
text: We had Merry Maids come in yesterday for a whole house, top to bottom, cleaning. This is the second time we’ve had them and both times were great. They do a very thorough job. The house is currently full of some of our older kids’ furniture so the working conditions weren’t all that great. They came in with four people and got the job done in about four hours. They were easy to have in the house. I was raised in the motel business and used to be the person that followed up and checked on how well the maids cleaned the rooms; I know where to check to see if everything has been dusted. Merry Maids knows how to get the dirt and dust cleaned up! We haven’t used any other Huntsville maid services but we are so happy we will be using Merry Maids on monthly basis.

name: Bill Gibbons
text: On time, efficient, friendly, service.  Very satisfied with the quality of the cleaning performed.

name: Rebecca Fletcher
text: This company and their employees are very customer oriented and a pleasure to work with.  I would rate them with 41/2 stars ⭐️

name: Brian Taylor
text: Very nicely cleaned and tidy.  Very pleasant to come home to. Did a great job.

name: Linda Heileman
text: Maria did a excellent job very professional. I love the little touches like the stickers she put on toilet paper and the way she fixed the towels. I differently would have her clean my house again.

name: Kay Walton
text: Excellent response to initial request for service, great service, most important, they worked around my 25 yr old lab, Lindsey is awesome and both Jake and I requested her full time, you can't go wtong with Merry Maifs

name: Michael Briggs
text:
3/10/2016 Victoria did another great Job today.
3/03/2016 Victoria did a great job in cleaning our home yesterday! Thanks and keep it up!

name: Katrina Harris
text: Downstairs bathroom was not cleaned and light fixture in kitchen was not dusted. Left at 4 I guess her shift was over🤷🏾‍♀️

name: rebecca keller
text: Very good job!

name: Jason Butler
text: Awesome Ladies. Always a pleasure

name: Chip Carter
text: Victoria is very professional and provides great service.  She cleans everything very well and is very cheerful.   It's a pleasure doing business with Merry Maids of Huntsville.

name: Fred Hamrick
text: I have been a customer for almost 4 years now and have never been disappointed with the service.  Most of the maids have been friendly and professional.  I recently had a conflict on the time that they were supposed to arrive, and they re-arranged their schedule to help me out.  I was very thankful for that.  I would like to specifically thank Donna for her work. I just had another time conflict which was handled by Julia. Thanks.

name: Toni Atkinson
text: Have been using off and on for over 10 years and have been thoroughly satisfied. My current housekeeper is Denise. I rate her 5 stars.

name: brett maxey
text: Love Maria, she does a great job and is a welcome smile in our home!

name: Butler Builders
text: The ladies are always thorough and friendly. As you can image our floors are always covered in dirt and saw dust. We look forward to our cleaning day with Merry Maids.

name: Denis Bergquist
text: Denise and the other teammembers do a great job and always take care to be pleasant and go the extra mile to make sure everything is done at each visit. Very satisfied

name: Bess Smith
text: The house was clean and everything smelled great

name: Tanya Wilson
text: My team is professional, quick and thorough. They always do an excellent job and my house looks great when they're finished!

name: Keri Harrison
text: Maria is getting these five stars. Really appreciate her attention to detail.

name: Peggy Pitcher
text: Considerate and friendly.

name: Katrina Marie Stapleton
text: My house was spotless and the staff is  so friendly.

name: Miria Finckenor
text: I started using them when I was pregnant and on bedrest.  Still using them 14 years later!  Donna usually does my service, and I'm very happy with her work.

name: Mumzee Lewis
text: Impressed and encouraged by the service.

name: George McKinney
text: Jennifer does a great job of handling our housecleaning.  We've used Merry Maids for over 10 years.

name: Janet
text: We are very pleased with the home cleaning service and Taneshia is very friendly and very efficient. Great!

name: Aubrey Freeman
text: Friendly and professional, all the way!  My house looked incredible and smelled so nice - very thorough.  Thank you, Merry Maids!

name: Colleen Laymon
text: Denise did a fantastic job. She was very professional and very detailed.

name: Bill Collins
text: Victoria did a great job. Previous crew that did "deep clean" wasn't as thorough.

name: Jessica Hickey
text: Before I start I am about a month behind posting this comment but I thought it was important to post. I called and set up a deep cleaning for my home, including one bedroom and a bathroom; they quoted $189. The person who I spoke to was nice and worked with me when I had to move the cleaning date.  When the ladies showed up they were nice and hard at work.  However, I was disappointed when they left. Not only did they not clean the LITTLE nook coming in from the garage leading to the kitchen because it counted as a separate living space (which would cost extra), there were some spots they clearly missed especially annoying since it was a "deep clean". Then they told me the cleaning would cost more than $250! That's a huge difference from what I was quoted and my house wasn't extremely dirty (I have another maid service I used once a month).  Overall, the maids are extremely nice and my house was left smelling wonderful but I wouldn't use them again unless I had time to clean more after they left and an extra $100 available for when they bait and switched the quoted price.

name: Sarah Kelley
text: They do a great job--always glad to come home to a clean house!

name: Don Platt
text: Victoria does a great job at our home and office in Huntsville, AL.

name: leigh Manning
text: cleaned my house quickly and efficiently

name: Sheila Turney
text: Clean house says it all!

name: John Temple
text: The house was very clean. It was clear that the house was cleaned very well and that everything has been touched. Baseboards, corners, and hard to reach areas were cleaned. There was s sticker to show the hard to reach area were cleaned.

name: Ellen Ovson
text: Denise is conscientious and reliable.

name: Rob Hughes
text: Worst company ever half ass service terrible to there employees won't ever use them

name: Star Prime15
text: Hope to get a job with them! :3

name: Anonymous Hurst
text: Denise is polite, prompt, quick, & thorough.

name: Cynde Tannehill
text: Third time was the charm for us with The Housekeepers.  The first time was good, the second time was horrible, but we had a great experience this past week with Amber.  She  did an absolutely amazing job!  We have struggled with finding a good housekeeper and everyone in the past has been mediocre at best.  Amber sets the bar high!  My husband and I were very happy with her cleaning of our home.  She is prompt, friendly and very detailed.  And most importantly, my cats liked her!  That means a great deal to us.  Looking forward to having Amber as our regular person to clean our home.  Love her!!

name: Christine Miller
text: I've been a customer of the Housekeepers for 10+ years.  They make the process of having cleaning help in your home easy and worry free.  Yesterday, Jayce was out to my house for the first time and she did an amazing job!

name: Kim Curry
text:
I need too much help to get their service.

They get a 3 because they're not the first company I've heard that from. So while I'm disappointed, it's not a surprise.

My problem is, I've already brought in the specialist service that's supposed to get me ready.

I don't need instant perfection. I need regular help that'll keep me motivated to do more when they're not here.

name: Jennifer Satterfield
text: Our house was cleaned today for the first time by The Housekeepers Inc. The professional that cleaned our house was named Madison. She truly exceeding mine and my husbands expectations. On time, attention to detail and thorough. Thank you Madison for all of your hard work and thank you to The Housekeepers Inc. for such professionalism.

name: Allison Bevelheimer
text: I received my first service from Jody Wednesday April 7.  Jody did an absolutely amazing job!  I have struggled with finding a good housekeeper and everyone in the past has been mediocre.  Jody set the bar!  I could not be more pleased!  And most importantly, my fur babies absolutely love her!  That means a lot to me.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great reveiw

name: Vanessa Miller
text: We had a sub cleaner, Raquel. Raquel showed up early and stayed a long time really cleaning the place. She did a fantastic job!

name: Jill Davis
text: Jessica M did my last cleaning and she did such a great job.  It may getting ready for thanksgiving so much easier.  Housekeepers does a great job every time I have them over.  My husband gave me housekeepers as a Christmas gift several years ago.  Best gift ever!!!

name: James Rochester
text: Brittney was on-time and extremely thorough.  She is very friendly and most importantly, our dog Donut, fell in love with her.  We highly recommend this company, and especially Brittney!

name: Dana Lesiak
text: We have been using the Housekeepers for a couple months. Tyra is AMAZING!!! She is professional, friendly, and accommodating to our crazy family and house. I highly recommend her and the company.

resp.text: It's so wonderful to hear you received great service. Thank you.

name: Annette Hawk-Rice
text: Jessica did an Awesome job cleaning my house on Friday, September  18th.  Looking forward to the next cleaning. She made my house shine!

resp.text: Jessica always does a great job. Thank you for the 5 star review.

name: Katy Best
text: Shanta did a fantastic job cleaning our house, and was so personable and friendly. She was extremely thorough and I was so pleased with the amount of work done for the pricing as well. We are definitely continuing with the biweekly service!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Best for such a wonderful review! We are always pleased to hear our customers are happy with their service.

name: Jayne Young
text: The Housekeepers have been taking care my house for a long time.  Every housekeeper I have had has done a great job.  My current assigned housekeeper, Leigha, is fantastic. She does not cut corners.  She always does a wonderful job.  I am so pleased. Housekeepers office manager is great also. She is so helpful when I need to reschedule.

name: Lawrence Marker
text:
I have been using The Housekeepers for the past three years, and I could not be more satisfied.  We have had several other housekeepers over the years that cost more and did a lot less.  You have your choice of weekly, biweekly, or monthly.  I use the biweekly option.  I believe their prices are very reasonable for the service provided.

Our housekeeper (Leigh) is quick, efficient, and thorough.  She is friendly and very courteous.  I am an elderly widow on oxygen and my daughter who lives with me has a bad back, we can't do much in the way of house cleaning and our house is a bit cluttered.  Leigh works around the clutter and does a few little extras as needed to help us out.  She is the greatest.

The company provides all supplies and always gives me a reminder call the day before she is scheduled to arrive.  If my assigned housekeeper is ill or otherwise cannot come, they give the option of have a substitute if one is available, rescheduling, or skipping that cleaning.

I highly recommend this company

name: JoeSandy Garcia
text: Madison did a great job cleaning our house. She is thorough and professional, much appreciated!

resp.text: We are so glad you were pleased with Madison. Thank you so much for your review.

name: Isabel Jones
text: I was very impressed with the quality of service. The cleaning was thorough—this was not a rush job. Attention was paid to every detail. My house not only is clean it feels clean. Thank you housekeepers!

text: This was our first experience with any house cleaners.  We had a "deep cleaning" prior to the holidays.  The two ladies, Michelle and Shanta, arrived at the exact promised time. The house now sparkles and is ready for visiting family.

text: Won't return calls.  Take 5 hours to clean when others do it in 3.

Hello, Mrs DeFalco!
So sorry to see you changed your 5 star review. We've tried reaching out to you this week and haven't been able to get through. Your regular housekeeper is very detailed and takes her time to get everything done. If you'd like, we can try a different housekeeper who works a bit faster. Please call us Mon - Fri 8- 4 and we'll get this resolved.

text: Leigha did a Great job cleaning my home

name: Sandy Ridley
text: We have been using The Housekeepers for two years.  They do a great job each time.

name: Russell Behr
text: Michele did her usual fantastic cleaning job.

name: Rita James
text: Firist I have been a client of the housekeepers for over 6+ years. I agree with Rupa Agrawal's review. At 1st I had no problem with my service but as I became a regular customer the service started to decline. I've had several housekeepers over my time with the company. I have always asked for just one housekeeper, which for the last 2 years I've had. Due to no fault of hers, she's been out sick for the past 6+ months and not able to come, so I asked for another permanent housekeeper because I don't like different people in and out of my house. Every time a new person comes my house has not been cleaned according to the checklist. I leave my clearning products because I don't like the company's products. There has been times that the bottles are not even open. They are to dust the blinds, dust the furniture, but if an area seems like it doesn't need dusting, or cleaning, even though it's on the checklist, it will not be done. We have a garden tub that is wiped out but not cleaned, you would think that if you're going to wipe the tub, although it should be cleaned, one would wipe around the tub. I can always tell that it has not been cleaned because there is dust and/or strands of hair.  Baseboards, "Really," they are hit or miss. This morning I called in to inform the office manager, whom I have spoken with several times before, that I was not please with my service. The manager didn't like what I had to say, so she hung up the Phone on me. I have one word for this Company's, service and Customer Service "TERRIBLE!" If you're looking for a cleaning service, I would NOT reccomend this one!

resp.text: After six years of regular service that you were happy with you left us a one star review.  We are sorry that your regular housekeeper was unable to clean for you. We are sorry that this was upsetting for you and understand that it was an inconvenience for you.  We tried to explain your regular housekeeper was diagnosed with cancer and was undergoing chemotherapy making it difficult for her to work.  We sent you some of our best cleaners as substitutes during this time but after each cleaning you were upset that it was not your regular housekeeper.  After each substitute you would pick apart the cleaning and ask for a new housekeeper saying it was not your regular person and you were unhappy with the work.  These were housekeepers who get rave reviews from their own regular customers!  We did everything we could to make you a happy customer including returning and re-cleaning any problem areas for free!  We did our best and we kept trying knowing that your regular housekeeper was doing well and within a few weeks was planning on returning to work.  We wanted you to be a happy customer again! The last time you called our office the phone log recorded an almost twelve minute call.  During this time you took your frustrations out on our office manager.  We had several employees in the office when you called and they could all hear your upset voice through the small speaker in the hand set since it was so loud.   She tried to understand your point of view and to help correct your concerns.   Twelve minutes is a long time to be chewed out and really it was not called for.  As the owner of the business I want to protect my employees and it is company policy that they don't have to tolerate verbal abuse. We will "go to the moon" for our customers and will always communicate in a professional manner but we need the same from you.  After a very long twelve minutes she needed to end the call.  The manager professionally told you she had to go and we would take your home off the schedule before she hung up the phone .   We did our best and we wanted to thank you for being our customer and allowing us to clean for you for the last six years.

name: Pam Colburn
text: Love the housekeeper they do a fabulous job. I would definitely recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer and leaving us a great review too!

name: Tanner “Harry” Moulton
text: The Housekeepers have been cleaning my house for over 10 years. I have never had a problem with them,  I will always use them because they are a business that has great integrity and have been in business for a long time because they take care of their customers!

resp.text: Thanks for a great review!

name: Rupa Agrawal
text: They were ok when i first hired them. Got fed up with different maids coming in each time. I had  to show them around each time what to do. The owners are pretty slick. They don't return your calls for 2-3 days. But they  are  always on time charging my credit card. One of the maids put her cleaning bucket on the bed, kitchen and bathroom counters and the couch inspite of telling her not to do that. God knows where all the bucket has been. Imagine spreading the germs. One day the  maid came in late ,she was in a hurry. She did a crappy job and left early because she was crunching for time.I was more flexible with the owners, whenever they called to reschedule I have always agreed to. But for "one time" when i wanted to reschedule they wouldn't. The  owner Pam is rude and abnoxious. I would not recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: We apologize that we could not schedule you with your regular housekeeper when you called and cancelled your scheduled cleaning and wanted to move it to the next day.  Your housekeeper had other scheduled clients to clean for on that day and did not have an opening.  We offered to send you another housekeeper on your requested day but you hung up .  We are sorry for upsetting you.

name: Samantha Steele
text: Very small place not what I expected the office staff was nice.

resp.text: So Glad you stopped by to visit. We keep our office small to keep our prices lower. Looking forward to hopefully earning your business in the future!

name: Jennifer Mitchell
text: The absolute worse cleaning service ever! We tried them three times and each time got worse!

name: Zenaida Bradford
text: Big shout out to Brown Cleaning Company! They did an excellent job cleaning my apartment! I would definitly recommend them to anyone at any time. Keep up the great work!

name: Sylvia Tompkins
text: First, they made it there early! They were extremely professional and friendly. I was surprised at how clean they got my house and how detailed they were in spaces I barely think to clean. They were also very timely and the prices were very reasonable for what I needed done. I would definitely recommend this cleaning service to anyone!! They are awesome and I would use them again!

name: Brandy Holmes /HoneySews Fashion
text: I contacted Brown Cleaning to do a deep cleaning of my residence after my household recovered from being sick. I must truly say She did an amazing Job! She was friendly, paid special attention to detail and very professional. I hired Brown Cleaning to assist monthly with the maintenance of my home. Thank you dearly.

name: Samantha Munn
text:
Highly recommended!! I called with a short notice cleaning request and was completely satisfied beyond expectations!  I had to move out of the area and didn’t have time to clean my residence. This company came
In and provided a detailed “white-glove”  cleaning that was beyond what I expected from a local company!
Professional service and competitive pricing!  Thanks so much to Jay and her attention to detail!!

name: Joanna Shettler
text: A huge thank you to Brown Cleaning Services for all their help with some of my rental homes. The response time is amazing and the finished product was perfect. I will continue to use this company for the rental homes I manage in this area. Highly recommended!!!!

name: Sammy
text: This is the best company i have ever used and would recommend 10x over. Brown services has been a big life saver for me. I work 40+ hours a week as well as my husband and we have two kids. Between work and trying to spend what little free time we do get with our kids our home tends to get disorganized throughout the week, but ever since Brown services came into our lives, our home remains spotless and organized despite the destruction of our two year old. We use Brown services every two weeks and sometimes once a week. Very professional, extremely punctual, friendly , and communicates well when explaining what type of services you are looking for. Prices are reasonable and i don’t think I’d use anyone else. We are beyond bless to have Jay and we recommend you try Brown services as well. You won’t be disappointed

name: Carol Schablow
text: This service company deserves strong praises for their meticulous focus on cleaning thoroughly every nook and cranny. They did all that I asked, and much more. My place was spotless! I'm highly impressed & definitely will use them for all detailed cleaning needs in the future.

name: Marquita Reynolds
text: Brown Cleaning Services is the absolute BEST!!!! Very professional, thorough, and efficient! I just love Zeljka, her spirit is so warm and welcoming. Highly recommend!!!

name: Dexter Bakery
text: These Ladies showed up ontime and prepared to work! We were a little out of there service area but they let us schedule them anyway on short notice. They did a tremendous job Deep cleaning out industrial kitchen area and gave us pointers to keep it clean until the next scheduled professional cleaning. We liked the fact that the owner Mrs. Zeljka was onsite an actually did  alot of the cleaning. We highly recommend this company and will use them again

name: Hack Meister
text: I had them come out for a serious deep cleaning! Price was good and they did a Super job! Will use again!

name: Constance Gray
text: I rarely post reviews but I had to give a shout out to this awesome company! I recently just moved to Maryland and was in a hurry to get my home ready for sell. Luckily I found Brown Cleaning Services and they just saved the day! From the beginning they explained the process, offered a reasonable price, and provided great communication. I own two fur babies and at times they can be a little messy. Brown was able to clean so well that you didn't know any pets lived in my home.  I highly recommend this company. Thank you!! Rocko and Chubbs say hi!

name: Claudia Driver
text: Mrs. Zeljka cleaned my house weekly before I moved away from Birmingham for work. She was highly recommended to me by a coworker and kept my house spotless. Aside from the weekly standard cleaning tasks, I really appreciated her for additional deep cleaning jobs like window cleaning, kitchen cabinets, baseboards and all the other things that I didn’t have time to get around to. When we moved Mrs. Zeljka got our house pretty and clean for sell. I wish I could’ve took her with us.

name: Carmarion D. Anderson-Harvey
text: OMG! The Brown Cleaning Service, LLC, is the best service on this side of heaven. The owners and their team members are the best at communicating, extremely attentive to accuracy and detail, and thorough workers. They operate an honest business who not out in the world, to take advantage of customers. They have a pure and passionate art towards cleaning. Not to mention, their prices were the best on the market. They did not quote me an estimate over the phone; instead came out, provided a walk-through, and took the time to inspect the property and offered me an exact quote.  I was amazed by how in-expensive they charged and my response, are you sure? They said, Yes! Overall, if you are looking for a business that will provide you with A+ service that is inclusive to all people, and down-to-earth with a passion for cleaning, you have found the right company. As a personal note to the owners, Mr. & Mrs. Brown, I applaud you!  For a professional responsible for equality work across Alabama, thank you for being inclusive and offering your services to LGBTQ+ Alabamians.

name: Alex Moore
text: Brown cleaning service showed up on time and was very professional and did an outstanding job at my home cleaning & sanitizing everything.  I definitely recommend giving them a call for all your cleaning needs.

name: Jeremy Hicks
text: Very professional and cleaning is done throughly. I will definitely recommend Brown Cleaning services to my family and friends.

name: Jan Cloutier
text: Dana and Katrina did a fabulous job! And they were a pleasure to have at my house. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Jan! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience! 😊

name: Janine Roberts
text: Amelia just left and she did a great job.   Everything looks and smells wonderful.   She is a lovely young woman.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and kind words, Janine! We appreciate you!

name: Cristina Salazar
text: Amelia and Kate have been cleaning for us for about a month and they always do such a great job! They’re punctual, work quickly, do a great job and are sweet!

name: Ramsha Zaidi
text: I love how Amelia do the stuff and clean my house.She is always on time and understands what type of cleaning i want.I would recommend her.

resp.text: Thank you kindly for your review!

name: mike taranto
text:
Called and discussed service. Staff was friendly. They were to have their customer service call to get price and schedule. After we hung up I got the following email:

Hello, Mr. Taranto. Thank you for reaching out! It sounds like your tenant may need the services of a company that handles more "heavy-duty" cleaning.

They offer deep cleaning on their website. Thought this was poor.

resp.text: Hello, Mike~ We do not handle pest infestations, or rodent urine and feces. We'd hoped to be helpful to you by taking a moment to point you in the direction of a company that is equipped to serve your needs and has the proper cleaning products, equipment, and protective gear to address biohazardous waste. We're sorry that you took offense to our recommendation and wish you all the best.

name: Meg Walton
text: I had the best experience with this company and with Nicole. First, their website is user friendly. Second, they had next day availability! Last, Nicole was delightful to have in the house and she left it sparkling. I have no criticism of the company or Nicole. Excellent experience and I will use them again.

resp.text: Hi Meg.  Thank you so much for the review!  We truly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to let Nicole know as well!

name: Missy Zak
text: Moving is stressful enough - even when you have service providers assisting - but Maids a la Mode took a huge burden off my shoulders. Cynthia and her crew worked into the night to get my house spotless for listing pics the next day. They had an incredible work ethic, aptitude and attitude. They truly saved my day and did it with a smile. I highly recommend this business and their professional team. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Missy!

name: Donna Brannen
text:
Bad communication problem, never got my house cleaned even though I booked it 6 weeks out.

Yes she had called to say she was in an accident on Friday the day it was scheduled. She called 2 hours after appointment to tell me this. She rescheduled for Monday morning
July 5, and on Sunday July 4th at 6pm she called to tell me she didn't have a car and could not get a rental in time. I was offered for a reschedule but my company was coming July 4 that evening. So it was too late then. Just bad experience from the get go as I had the appointment scheduled 6 weeks in advance. Never has a problem with the company before.

resp.text:
Hello Donna, We are so very sorry that your cleaner was unable to service your home. As you know, she was in an auto accident, and unfortunately was unable to service your home as scheduled. Being the 4th of July holiday, we were completely booked and unable to send a replacement. We'd hoped you would be open to rescheduling the following business day, but understand that your service was time sensitive. Thank you for the opportunity and we hope you know how sorry we are that you did not receive the service you'd been anticipating and looking forward to having.

Kind regards,
The Maids a la Mode Team

name: John Rand (John Rand the Handyman)
text: Great local business! Maids a la Mode handles all of my Airbnb turnovers and our personal residence as well. I refer them to my customers in my business, John Rand the Handyman, at least once a week. 100% dependable and high quality cleaning professionals!

resp.text: Thank you, John! We appreciate your business and confidence in our cleaning professionals!

name: Darcy Symes
text:
Ive used Maids a la Mode for going on about 8 years and would never think of trying another company! The cleaners they send are always top rate and very responsive to my needs.

Today Christina cleaned my oven (which I shamefully admit hadn't been cleaned in Well over a year (with lots of bubbling-over sweet potatoes during that time!) and she was happy to use a safe non-toxic product instead of the intense chemicals in standard oven cleaners - and a lot of elbow grease for sure. It’s so clean and PRETTY I just want to stare at it!  Great work all around. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Darcy! Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback!

name: Dymplez Key
text: I'm sorry but this company is very unorganized. I worked for this company and the owner does not respect her employees at all and she is not truthful with her word. Most of the providers never wanted to work and the operations and sales was always having to fix there mistakes. The owner is very rude and try to act like she cares but was very rude to her employees. The company does not offer proper training and if you ask for help the owner had an attitude and try to throw you off on another employee. Please find a more organized company because this one is not it. If I could give advice ton anyone looking at this company my advice is RUNNNNNNNNNNN and I mean that from a very passionate place. One star is only because I had to rate them because this company was getting a 0.

resp.text:
Ms. Key– As discussed, we did not renew your 30-day contract as Customer Service support because you did not meet the basic skills required to work with our company. Discourtesy and lack of professionalism in dealing with our valued Customers, basic spelling, grammar and written communication deficiencies, and the inability to follow clear, written instructions led to our decision not to renew your contract.

In order to honor our Agreement with you, we paid your fee in full through the end of your contract. But, in light of your professional shortcomings and deficiencies, we could not in good faith renew your contract or expend the additional company resources required to teach you the fundamentals we were under the impression you already possessed, per your resume.

We understand that after having been unable to secure work for one year prior to this, you had hoped this might be a longer-term engagement. After 60 hours of paid orientation and the considerable company resources allocated, we'd hoped for a longer-term engagement as well. Unfortunately, we simply do not have confidence in your ability to interact with and be of service to our valued Customers at this time.

resp.text: Hi Dawn.  Thank you for the great review!  We look forward to servicing your home again next month.

name: Savannah Stanley
text: Hello. I just got a comment under a post I wrote a review for FOUR YEARS AGO. I do not and have never worked for this company. Administration wrote under my comment that I was a previous employee? I was a customer and left a bad review and that was there cover up. I was affiliated with the company being a CUSTOMER not EMPLOYEE. If you own/manage the business and see this id like you to know that when you write a comment under a review get your facts straight. Have a great day! 🙂

resp.text:
Hello, Savannah. Our sincere apologies for any confusion. We really would like to clear this up with you. Our policy is to follow up with each and every one of our clients after every appointment to make sure that they are happy with their service. This is an important part of how we maintain excellent relationships with our clients and resolve any issues that may arise. However, when we first read your 1-star review, we attempted to reach out to you to see what had gone wrong so that we could fix it for you. But upon looking into our CRM system, we found no record at all of ever having performed service for a "Savannah Stanley". Perhaps, you booked your service under a different name? We did, however, have a Savannah S. who had recently stopped working with us, which is why we reached the conclusion we did.

Although 4 years have passed, we would sincerely like to know how we could have improved your experience and would love the opportunity to make you a happy customer moving forward. The owner, Kirsten Rand, can be reached at our Mobile office if you would like to speak with her personally. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

name: Jennifer Reeves
text:
So today I finally had my first cleaning with Two Maids and a Mop of Daphne. I had scheduled a while ago but had to keep rescheduling. They were early, which was good for me since I was out running errands. When I arrived home I found a few things that I didn’t like about the service... I am sure it’s picky but if I pay for a home clean, I want it done properly. But I also do recognize that it being the first clean, it takes a few times to get used to how I want things. First off, and this could have been a huge huge problem if I hadn’t of arrived home shortly after they were finished, my cats were locked in the master bedroom screaming to get out. If they had been locked in there for a while this could have resulted in them scratching up the carpet or them going to the bathroom in the bedroom. Also, all of the blinds were left wide open. I live in a nice community, but anyone walking buy could see right into my place and see I wasn’t home and see the nice things I have. That is a huge problem for me. If I had been out of town, this could have been very bad.
Then just a few small things... the master bed the comforter wasn’t made up on the bed but folded over at the bottom like it was a throw blanket. In the bathroom I had used qtips that I had forgotten to throw away on the counter top that were in the drawer instead of thrown away. The shower still had some hair in it. In the kitchen the mat in front of the sink was folded up and placed on top of the trash can? The wine bottles were messed up and fallen out of the wine rack. The entertainment center bottom shelves were not dusted but the cabinet doors were shut.
Other than those few things they did a great job. I’ll definitely be using them again as long as these items can be addressed and rectified.

name: Lynn Bruce
text: I bought a new home from an elderly woman who had a friend surface clean for her. Because of time restraints, I decided to hire a cleaning service to come in to deep clean before moving in. I explained to the owner that I needed my home deep cleaned and move in ready. The house was completely emptied and easy to maneuver around in. One employee showed up with a helper friend late afternoon. Long story short, they surface cleaned my house. I had to go behind them to ask questions like: "Did you clean the top of the cabinets, did you wipe down doors, did you clean the windows," etc. because it wasn't being done. As I inspected the kitchen, I noticed dried food stuck on the cabinets, dust on top of the cabinets, which I asked them to go back and clean -same experience in the bathrooms. One of the last tasks was mopping the floor. As one lady mopped, I noticed a small puddle of water on the floor, so I wiped it up. I looked at the white napkin in my hand and it was gray. Yes, she mopped my bathroom and kitchen floors with a filthy mop. I brought it to her attention and the second lady mopped behind the first one with another dirty mop. I seriously thought about asking the ladies to leave early, but I overheard one of them talking on the phone (at work) telling the caller that she was trying to make some money and would be home soon. After hearing that, I decided to allow them to finish the job. I paid the $150 but was extremely dissatisfied.

name: Nathan King
text:
On move-in day at our new house, we had another cleaning company scheduled, and they never showed. I called Two Maids & A Mop and asked if there was any way they could squeeze us in (this is a few hours before the end of the business day on a Friday, mind you). They ensured they could get us something, and within two hours, two cleaners were at our door.

Not only that, but our AC went out in the middle of the clean (it was 98 degrees outside). The cleaners just laughed it off and were incredibly professional and friendly. They even offered us some advice on cleaning certain areas of our new house in the future.

I recommend TM&AM to anyone needing cleaning services in the Auburn area. They are extremely dedicated to providing a quality product and good service. They were excellent in helping us with a situation that could have been a mess — literally and figuratively.

name: 廖本庭
text:
Be careful with your belongings...

Booked moving clean online. Last minute notice for changing time due to they don't go through that route the scheduled day. After cleaning was done, all of the blinds were not cleaned as advertised. Had to ask them to come back. When I went back to check again, the frame for the vent outlet was on the floor.... Worst of all, they threw away a large area rug after first cleaning instead of cleaning it as advertised on the website. Called to talk to customer service about the area rug and was told she wasn't authorized to handle this and will ask the owner to contact me. Nothing happened after a week. My wife called again and was told the same thing. Never was contacted. Paid more to get the service quality and hassle free  but it wasn't there.

resp.text:
Thanks for your feedback.  We are certainly not perfect but implying we would take or knowingly dispose of someone's belongings is baseless and says more about your character than ours....

Let's be clear, you left your rug with other items for our team to remove from home post move out.  Your attempt to imply otherwise unfair and not accurate.

Move in  / Move out is for empty homes.  Deep cleans are for homes where items remain.

As discussed several times, typically  in a move in / move out clean the expectation is the house will be empty.  We are glad to place a small amount of trash that remains in the garbage as a service.    In your case, you left some miscellaneous items as well as this rug.     As we explained, if there were items that were not to be disposed of, you needed to provided guidance prior to our team arriving and cleaning the home.

Do believe our team went back to home to address an item you discussed with our manager.   We try extremely hard to stay on schedule but some times events occur outside our control.  Not an excuse just the reality.

End of the day we certainly don't like having dissatisfied customers but are willing to take the negative feedback rather than pay for a rug that was left with other items to be disposed of after move out.  Had we been provided this direction prior to arriving at home we would be more than glad to address.    Thanks for your business and my apologies your are dissatisfied with your experience.  Sometimes we simply cannot find a solution that is fair to both parties based how event transpire.

Three cleaning ladies came and they blocked the indoor security camera with their purse while they were cleaning 2nd floor. They didn’t clean windows and blinds. I didn’t pay $676 for wiping the countertops, moping floors and cleaning bathrooms. They scrubbed the shower head in master bathroom and got damaged.
So disappointed. I’ve contacted and they said it is sheetrock dust on my windows and needs several cleanings. Doesn’t make sense at all because I saw dust on all windows and blinds a hour after they cleaned.
Never recommend to anyone.

name: Naomi Rigby
text:
First - let me say - I have VERY high expectations when paying someone to clean my house...
Now, let me say...
I WOULD recommend Two Maids and a Mop (Auburn) - only because of Whitney and Melissa!!!
Two weeks ago - yesterday, Two Maids and a Mop (Auburn) came to my house for a thorough cleaning.  After leaving, unfortunately, I was unimpressed, but because we all have "bad days", my first instinct was to give them another chance.
The day of my follow-up cleaning (2 weeks later), I sent a text to confirm my appt time - since I did not receive a text reminder - like I did for the initial cleaning.  After a short time had past, with no reply, I called and spoke to Chrissy.  Although I did not call to complain, I did mention that I was not satisfied with my first cleaning - and why, but explained that - because everyone has bad days - I was waiting for this cleaning to see how things went.  I must say, once on the phone, Chrissy was very responsive and willing to make everything right.
Now to the GOOD stuff...  Whitney and Melissa.  These 2 ladies are THE BOMB!  They came in - WORKED HARD, and had my house "sparkling" when they left - so much so - that upon their departure, I immediately sent  Chrissy another text message - PRAISING their work and asking to have these 2 young ladies clean my house from now on.  (Sadly - I am still awaiting a response.)
It is women like Whitney and Melissa who make a business look - not just good - but impeccable!!!! - and all the bad bearable.  (Two Maids and a Mop - Auburn needs to do all they can do to keep these 2 ladies happy and working for them!)
I sincerely hope I hear back from Chrissy soon - saying - yes to my request. 😀

name: Shannon Anway
text: I was never informed the deep cleaning would cost $400 dollars, but was charged $400. To clarify, when I entered the information online I was given the price of $140 dollars. I THEN spoke with a representative of the company who clarified the first clean would be a deep clean, but never stated this would result in a higher cost. I was completely misled to believe my fee would be the $140 versus almost $400. When I called to discuss they could not give me a rational for why the price was as expensive as it was and accused me of lying on the internet submission regarding occupancy and square footage even though I told the woman I spoke to on the phone I lived with my boyfriend and two dogs. Completely unprofessional, dishonest and clearly have poor business ethics. Additionally, when I informed them I’ve used cleaning services for a number of years and have never been charged that much for an initial clean (and told them the name of the company I had used in my previous rental), they eluded to the fact that the company in question was not professional or a legitimate business. Who speaks of competitors that way? Would never recommend and would give zero stars if possible.

resp.text:
Shannon thanks for your feedback.  As I understand you booked your clean online.  There is some expectation that folks who enter data requested for booking online will provided accurate data.  When booking online you indicated you had 0 pets, 1 occupant, and your square footage was 2200.   My understanding is you have 2 occupants and 2 pets per your phone conversation.    Your clean was actually discounted based on less occupants and no pets.

My understanding is you had no issues with the service other than price.  Hard to address what you heard or did not hear during the call with our office as it relates to price.  We certainly try to communicate price as part of any booking but your reaction indicates you did not hear it or we failed to communicate it.

Lastly, based on your call your position was discount or negative reviews.  Unfortunately we do run into this situation 1 or 2 times per year.   Certainly don't like failing to meet your expectations, but will not be coerced into discounts by threats either.  You bear some responsibility to understand the services you have secured. This would certainly be an exception for one of our customers to invite us into their home to clean and not know what services they will receive and what they will cost.

Any desire to discuss further just call the office and let Chrissy know you want to chat with the owner and she will put us in touch.

name: Deborah Jackson
text: The management is the problem. To get your business they claim they will be glad to work in your choices of appointments. But then you are at the mercy of someone sitting at the computer and letting it generate times and days. Your schedule doesn’t matter. Poor service model. They think you work for them. Some type of issue with the manager and her ability to follow directions. You cannot substitute their services either. I make my own beds, take trash out and pick up house in advance thinking other items could get done in place of those chores. Nope, anything but what is listed is extra. Not sure though how they do ceiling fans on the list because once you hire them, they refuse to get on a step stool. Price point is higher than other competitors.

resp.text:
Deborah I am sorry that your experience has led you to feel this way.  I can certainly appreciate your comment around being at the mercy of someone at a computer screen.

The Team has cleaned your home two previous times without comment or criticism.   In fact, after your Thanksgiving clean you texted “the girls did a really good job”.

Today you turned our team away and were charged a cancellation fee.  These type fees are always a tough decision as a business owner.   You know a negative review might be coming because you stuck by your cancellation policy.  In most cases it is the right thing to do for the PHC's whose earnings will be impacted by the late cancellation. For 99% of customers this simply is not a problem as we share this policy in our Welcome Packet.

Like most service companies we do utilize computer scheduling.  We offer multiple cleaning packages.  We even offer custom packages.  Cost will vary based on requirements. What we do is complete the clean as defined in the package you purchase.  Most customers prefer to know what they will receive and want it done consistently.

Now let me offer you some feedback as the owner.  I have owned this location since it opened.  We are not perfect but strive to improve every day.  After speaking with multiple members of our team it is clear to me that your goal was to bully your way out of a fee you were fully informed of.  You were extremely abusive and spoke down to all of our team members on the day after Christmas of all days.

While I can empathize with your frustration with being charged a cancellation fee I would challenge to treat people with dignity and respect in the future.  If you cannot do that then I suspect most small business owners like myself would prefer you take your business somewhere else.

Thank you for your feedback.  Have a Happy New Year and if I can ever be of any assistance call the office and ask for Blue.  They will get us in touch.

name: Melissa
text: Kaci, La’Rae, and Jamie were awesome! My apartment has never been so clean! They were very nice, and worked quickly without missing anything! I have never used a cleaning service before, so I really didn’t know what to expect; nevertheless, I was blown away by how well my apartment looked! My kitchen has never looked so spotless! I keep finding things that they cleaned that I wouldn’t have even thought about (i.e. my microwave)! Amazing work with such kind workers! I would highly recommend!

name: john garner
text:
The owner of two maids and mop sent two inexperienced maids that moved slow and lacked communication skills. The owner told them what to do over text messaging and phone. They obviously never cleaned an oven or owned a dishwasher. The maids did not do most of the stuff the owner said they would over the phone. They did not even clean two rooms.
I have had my home cleaned by experienced maids that worked hard. If you need your house cleaned for a reasonable price, don't waste your money here.
I suggested to the owner that she should send a list of what they do and don't do. She argued with me about that. She should have sent someone experienced, but she was more interested in basically stealing my money for cheap labor.

resp.text: John,  I wanted to reach out regarding your concerns. I have had an opportunity to discuss with team.  First let me say thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We will strive to improve based on the deficiencies you highlighted. Second, let me say I am sorry that you had a bad experience. As our slogan says we strive to be “A Maid Service Worth Talking About”.  This was a situation where we tried to provide service in a situation we probably should not have.  Our team called the office on arrival and quickly noted to management that we would be unable to conform to our standards in the time we estimated based on our phone conversation.  We estimate times based in large part on customer feedback about conditions at the location.   We called you after their arrival in an attempt to reset expectations based on our visual inspection.  Your dissatisfaction confirms that in some cases the service we provide is not the solution.  I feel our team probably knew that on arrival but we tried to be helpful and proceed.  For that we apologize.  Glad to discuss further are your convenience.  Just call the office and ask them to get you in touch with Blue.

name: Jinright Family
text: We’ve used Two Maids and a Mop a few times now and been very pleased. Chrissy is a pleasure to work with and oversees the job to make sure everything is done well. Christina, Landon and April came today and I was even more impressed. I confess to being hard to please in this area, but they were successful. Their attitudes were genuinely pleasant and enjoyable to interact with. I say genuinely because they didn’t seem to be putting on a show to get a good review. My son was home and they were kind to him and even engaged him in conversation. I must also confess that they worked so quickly that I was sure I’d find things not cleaned to my liking, but again was pleasantly surprised!

name: Gina Austin
text: Hired this company to clean before we moved in a house we recently purchased in Opelika. The team commented that the house was one of the cleanest they'd ever encountered as a move in cleaning so I showed them the areas I was most concerned about. We asked about time frame and were told they estimated about three hours. We returned home in less then two hours to find cleaning crew was already gone. Master bathroom shower was not cleaned, spots on kitchen floor which I cleaned and sent photo of to contact number (no response), oven sprayed with cleaner but not wiped out, side of refrigerator which I specifically pointed out not cleaned. Very disappointed with this service and would not recommend them.

resp.text: Gina as discussed by phone a few weeks back we would be glad to get a team back out and address any items you feel were missed.   We have not heard back so please call us at your convenience.  334 246-9099
