text: Christina and Melissa did a great job cleaning our house! They made sure everything on our list was fine, ensuring that we receive our security deposit! Very affordable!!

name: Abbey Johnson
text:
My mom had hired this company to do a “move out” cleaning of my apartment, the furniture was all moved out and the apartment needed a fairly deep clean before it was inspected. We went back to check everything out almost 4 days after the service came through, and found my thermostat (that I had previously turned off since no one was living there) was running and had been running 24/7 on 65 degrees, and my bedroom fan was still running. So now we will be paying the electric bill for those almost 4 days where my air conditioner had been left to run on a very high setting. Opened the closet with the water heater and there was still dog hair all around the floor, the oven had not been cleaned out, there were flecks of dirt in the bathtub that were not there when I moved out, and nothing around the washer/dryers had been cleaned out. We also went through and re-mopped the floors, and there was dirt coming up on the mopping pads as if the floors had barely been touched. When we sent the photos to the manager, she called my mother back to argue with her that the apartment was very dirty and that they don’t touch water heaters. Apparently sweeping up the floor around the water heater is considered messing with it? This also does not explain the dirty oven, the dirt in the tub that was not there before, and the utilities that had been turned on and left on high for days. All she did was half heartedly offer to come help my mom clean (we had already cleaned up after them so we declined), and no apologies or attempts to reconcile for these other issues were made. She literally only called my mom back to argue with her. $200 later for an hour cleaning of a 450 sq foot apartment, and we had to go spend another hour cleaning up all the stuff they left behind.

If you don’t leave your apartment spotless, which defeats the entire purpose of having a cleaning service come in (I’m not talking leaving it absolutely filthy and covered in trash, but needing reasonable deep cleaning after 2 years of living there), then don’t even bother hiring this service. If you have any complaints or concerns you’ll be argued with and no attempts to reconcile or partially reimburse will be made. Seriously, this service is very overpriced for the service you receive. Hopefully you’ll find better cleaners elsewhere. Very unprofessional.

resp.text:
Abbey your mother did hire Two Maids & a Mop of Auburn.   I am the owner and have had an opportunity to discuss this situation with our team.  Don’t believe you have had any interaction with our team but the space in question is your apartment.

Our team shows up and based on conditions instantly called our manager.

Manager contacted your mother based on condition of apartment on arrival.

It is crucial that we understand the condition of location we will be cleaning so that we price it correctly and adequately schedule time to complete.

Team actually spent an hour over expected time to clean based on conditions they encountered.
.
We received call from your mother on Monday (4 days after clean) with several concerns.

We welcome feedback and as a team look for opportunities to get better each and every day.

Our manager offered to come to the location and walk through it with your Mother and address any missed items.

We value your opinion and thank you for your feedback, but this feedback feels inconsistent with the effort put in by our team cleaning your apartment and that is disappointing.

I will simply close by saying I am glad to have a conversation about this at your convenience.  Feel free to call the office and our team will provide you my contact.   Blue.

name: Amanda McCourry
text: Two Maids was fantastic.   Loved the attention to detail in the cleaning process.  Thanks Kacie and Melissa, you both were awesome!

name: Jonathan
text:
I hired Two Maids & Mop of Auburn for a “deep clean” of my home and did not receive the level of service expected for the price ($345 for less than 1,200 square feet on the lower level of my home).  Quite honestly, it wasn’t even equivalent to what I’d expect from a basic weekly cleaning.  After reporting this to their local office (same day), I was told that refunds or even price adjustments are strictly against franchise policy. My only option was having them revisit my home. The office manager returned with the crew that afternoon for a redo which included an awkward walkthrough.  At times, I actually felt like I had to defend myself for questioning the quality of their work.

Point being, I called this company to help me. I had no issues with paying a premium price, but expected a premium service.

This was such a waste of money and an overall bad experience.  I never even received a follow-up call.  I hope that my review is helpful to those researching cleaning services in Auburn and also to management in possibly reevaluating their policies, pricing, and services.

resp.text:
Johnathan thanks for taking the time to provide our team feedback.  While not what we would like to hear it is through feedback like yours that we can evaluate what we are doing and identify areas for improvement.

Would be glad to discuss your experience at your convenience.  I would be interested to hear about the specific problems you encountered with our clean.

Your satisfaction is our goal.   We are always striving to improve our polices and cleaning processes.  Your rating directly impacts the compensation of our team via our Pay for Performance compensation plan.

Call the office at your convenience and tell them you would like to connect with Blue.

name: Lindsey Morgan
text: I am so disgusted and appalled by my experience with this company, I just don't even know where to start with this review.  I will NEVER trust positive Google reviews ever again when researching companies.  I am still so mad I am shaking as I type this.  If I could give negative stars I would.  Now that I have had a night to think clearly about my experience with them yesterday, hopefully writing this review will help someone else not have to deal with the absolute complete hell I had to go through yesterday.  I hired this company to move my family.  I am a single mom of 4 and couldn't move us on my own.  The guys showed up and the loading process was slow.  There was frequent standing around, smoke breaks, one of the guys even asked me to go out and buy them food and I ended up feeding them from my fridge to try to speed the process up.  I did have a lot of stuff to load, but reaching out to multiple companies today to inquire about timing with the type of load I had, the time frame was half what took place at my house, almost like they were milking the clock.  Then when getting to my new home, the men were following me (we left old house at the same time) and they disappeared for over half an hour.  Upon arrival at my new home all hell broke loose!  They spent more time arguing, fighting, taking smoke breaks (cigarettes and marijuana - I thought I smelled it and it was later confirmed by one of the men) and on their phones complaining about their coworkers than actually unloading the moving truck.  It was so bad that myself and my children had to help unload the moving truck because these "men" were too busy threatening each other and their families.  They were yelling and screaming at each other in my driveway for over an hour, using profanity and racial slurs, all in front of my children and new neighbors!!  When we left to do the second load more time was spent because one of the men wouldn't get in the Uhaul they had rented and started walking down the road.  Then at the end of the day when everything was finally completed I felt like I was robbed when I paid.  Yes, the owner did give a two hour partial discount on time, but after thinking more over the night and about what happened the discount was no where near what it should have been after what myself and my kids had to go though.  It was hell to a point where the cops were almost called.  Two hours and stopping the clock on the one man when he started walking down the road is no where near enough, especially when part of the time I had to pay for was for them fighting.  I saw on a previous review the owner told a customer to get a conscience.  Now I am saying that to them.  What was supposed to be a happy and exciting day for me turned into me crying for half the day and dealing with absolute HELL and it is all this companies fault for their unprofessionalism and absolutely horrible actions!!!!

And didn’t put anything back together.  Shame on the owner for prolonging moves  and getting more money from  customers. All they do is rent a uhaul truck and get anybody to move. Never again !! name: Carrie Plank
text: Muscle 4 Moving helped us move in December 2018. We had moved previously that year and we used a different company, so we were dreading the experience. However, we were so pleased with the work that was done by Felix and his guys. The workers arrived on time, and worked extremely hard and efficiently. It was a huge move and took all day, but the guys barely stopped, even to eat. Muscle 4 Moving does not arrive dressed in matching uniforms and some of the “bells and whistles” that other moving companies do, but they were certainly ready to get the job done, with a smile. If you don’t want to pay thousands of dollars to move, then this company will be a good fit for you.

resp.text: Thanks, Carrie!. Glad we could help.

name: Rodney Williams
text: Great service, very friendly staff. Over all, these guys were amazing moving us.

name: Matt Hallman
text: Had CJ pressure wash our home after we bought it. It hadn’t been cleaned in years. It now looks as good as it did when it was new. Our exterior is completely vinyl siding. They were done in a couple hours. Would have taken me days. Hiring them was well worth it, and I’ll be calling again when it’s time.

name: rebeccawcleung
text: CJ and his team is extremely friendly and responded very quickly to my request for a quote. The price is fair and they promised to come within the same week. They worked professionally and helped to clean my gutter and windows and did a thorough job pressure washing the driveway and the exterior. He also showed me that a part of my roof needs repair and took pictures to show me. He even offered to put in a few screws to fix my gutter which is coming loose! They went above and beyond and I am so impressed. CJ even helped me to change my exterior lightbulb because I didn't have a long ladder! I will definitely use them again and highly recommend to anyone.

name: THE ACOUSTIC CAGE
text:
Contacted him december 5th...told me he'd get back with me...december 22nd, he texts to say "aint forgot you", then forgot me...now its jan 11th....these guys dont need business...they have too much apparently...i'll just get rags, windex, and do it myself.
So much easier this way....

Reply: this is the only way i can find to reply to you, CJ...im greg nelson.

resp.text: Who are you? I don't recall speaking with you.

text: CJ is an extremely friendly, easy-going guy. He was respectful and attentive and did a quality job for us - even when I kept adding more and more windows that I wanted him to clean! I am proud to recommend him and his company!

name: S. K.
text: I messaged CJ’s on Saturday, had an estimate back from them ASAP: it’s only Thursday and terrible weather for a partially exterior project, and the job is complete already. My windows had dirt, bugs, and cobwebs all over them. They were streaked on the exterior. Now they look brand new, like newly installed. (CJ’s cleaned the interiors of my windows too.) Plus, they pressure washed my badly stained and mildewed walkways and patios making them look like newly poured concrete. From start to finish they were three words — PROFESSIONAL, REASONABLE, and THOROUGH. I have very high expectations for services such as these, and I couldn’t be more pleased. Thank you, CJ’s!

name: Juana Gutierrez
text: I was almost mowed down by an employee. Their blatant disregard for the rules of operating a motor vehicle is sickening. He was on his phone speeding and used no blinker in a construction zone on the interstate and had the audacity to shoot me the bird when I honked to let him know I was on the road. Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

name: Chancee Terry
text: Carl came out and got the job done! house looks brand-new the doors almost blinded us when we looked at him we will definitely use them again!!

I submitted a request for a quote over the phone and had a tough time personally taking the call - Shea was VERY pleasant and called me back when I thought it would be a better time. She was very thorough in her explanation of all they did and the pricing. We were able to schedule a clean the same week even!! They did a fantastic job and were very thorough, professional and we will he having them come back! In fact, the next clean is already set up!!

Follow up 1/3/21: There was a mix up last Thursday but The Maids Quickly And very efficiently got everything squared away and came today and performed the same great service I’ve had for months now!! Thank you The Maids!! Happy New Year to y’all!!

text: Detailed and timely. When I have to reschedule, they are understanding and with me back into the schedule without issue. I can tell that they actually clean under things and not around them

name: Val E
text:
Not satisfied!! I purchased a preowned home. I call The Maids and explained to them that the house was empty and In need of a deep clean (everything to be cleaned). I was told not to worry that everything would be cleaned. After they arrived, the manager said that she needed to increase the price $180 because I had a lot of kitchen cabinets. (They were already there, so I agreed).

As I did the walk through I was finding stuff that wasn’t cleaned and they were going back trying to clean it. After they left I looked over my house and OMG! My house was NOT CLEANED. My floors were still dirty, I swept and mopped and the mop water was Black. The bathrooms were NOT cleaned, refrigerator wasn’t cleaned, cabinets were not cleaned, dust and spider webs still remain in certain areas. It was so much that I discovered that wasn’t cleaned. I literally had to clean my house myself.  I do want to say that they did clean my baseboards and the plantation blinds. When I notified their office and sent pictures, they asked if I wanted them to come back out. My reply was NOooooooo. You have already shown me how you clean. So she did take off the $180 up-charge.  For the amount of money that I paid I was just expecting my house to be squeaky clean. I was highly disappointed. I just don’t want anyone else to make the same mistake of having high expectations from THE MAIDS.

resp.text: Val - My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company. We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind. In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee, which is why we offered to go back to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service. At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  Please contact our office to let us know what we can do to get the issue resolved.

name: James Byrd
text: Great job. Love the service. Courteous and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our business on Google! We appreciate your business over the past year and look forward to cleaning for you again soon, James!

name: Candace Shoaff
text:
Cleaning and More overcharged my debit card by $400 for a uhaul rental.  I called Monday morning as soon as they opened and they told me it was their mistake they would reverse it.   I didn't call again until Thursday as I was trying to be patient.  Thursday my account was overdrawn and they told me they couldn't do anything about it to call Uhaul.   If I had a business and my mistake had caused someone the problems this has caused me I would have figured out how to get that person their money back.  Not take their money and then say my hands are tied.
Very unprofessional, horrible customer service.  Most definitely do not do business here if you can avoid it.

name: Rachel Dawsey
text: Cleaning and more has been cleaning for our business for years.  They are very reliable.  If we ever have any problems, the owners are quick to correct.  It is very convenient to order supplies from the Hope Janitorial supply so that the Cleaning and More staff deliver them.  You get a discount on supplies if they clean for you.

resp.text: Cleaning & More appreciates you taking the time to comment on your service.  It has been a pleasure serving your company for the past six years and look forward to many more.  It is Cleaning & More's hope all our customers see us as a long term relationship by serving them with reliability and dependability. Thank you again!

name: Marie Porter
text: We have used Cleaning and More for over 10 years and have always been satisfied with their work. If anything was ever missed, Donna had someone correct it quickly without hesitation. They have even checked on our cat for us, when we were on vacation. I would highly recommend Cleaning and More!

Let me express our experience in business in a quote by John Lydgate: "You can please some of the people all the time, you can please all of the people some of the time, but you can't please all of the people all of the time."

name: Kanesha Morrison
text: Amazing service, on time and had a smile. The cleaner really loved what she was doing. She made me feel like she wanted to be here. I will totally be a regular customer. I am referring everyone I know.

name: luke valenzuela
text:
I would not recommend this company.  I had bad services.  I even tried to call back to see if they can fix what they missed,  as it was there policy to do so within 48 hours.

We have been at the children's hospital of Atlanta for about a month now, and decided to get our house cleaned for us before we are released to go home. We picked ECC to do the cleaning,  we needed this because our newborn has HCD and her immune system is not strong. Nothing was dusted off and we even requested 2 rooms to be cleaned plus the standard common area's.  Well they only cleaned 1 and left doors and windows still dirty. Plus many other areas.  Very poor cleaning.  I have a lot to complain but just want to sum it up. I spent $300 and got no actually cleaning done, I just got stuff tidying up.  Yeah I wasn't home to check right after, I made all these arrangements by phone.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking our call on today Mrs. Valenzuela. It was a pleasure to speak with you. As stated on the call, prior to reading this review we did not have any idea there was a possible problems. Normally, our clients are extremely satisfied with our work. (However, we do understand there will be occasional hiccups.) We have an open door policy for our clients to communicate with us. Our customer care department is open 24 hours a day. Upon carefully reviewing we have searched our database and did not find any missed calls or voicemails pertaining to the matter. Here at ECC, we want to make sure you are BEYOND SATISFIED. We have been operating for many years and our reputation is the key to staying in business. We do apologize for the missed areas. It was truly an un-intentional  over-look. Rest assured, this will not happen again. We appreciate you for being kind and understanding earlier during our phone call. Per our conversation you have accepted our offer and looking forward to making things right.

Looking forward to cleaning again for you. Enjoy your new baby!

Best Regards,

Shan Burden
Owner

name: Gloria Davis
text: Excellent service and professional, friendly  workers!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Davis! We appreciate your business!

name: Emily Fields
text: I'm a full time working mom and I have 2 boys that both play baseball. This time of year I get so upset because I can't keep up with my cleaning like I want to. So I decided to try these girls out!! I'm MORE than satisfied. The girls that cleaned cared so much about the job they were doing. They cleaned my house from top to bottom even cleaned my stove and fridge!!!!!

name: Miciah Todd
text: Very professional and dependable!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Todd! We do our best to ALWAYS remain professional and dependable. :-)

name: Fiona
text:
I have purchased a new fixer upper and it needed a thorough cleaning to say the least. The home had been sitting vacant for almost two and half years. So, we needed someone to clean from top to bottom. It was gross! And honestly, we did not have the time nor energy to tackle the mess. I have seen ECC on WTVM channel 9 a few times in the morning. They had a special promo I couldn't refuse. LOL WOW, Annetta and Alea are my Sheros! It would have taken us hours to complete everything.

If you need a deep cleaning I highly recommend you calling them. They were friendly, arrived on time and the prices are super affordable compared to other companies. Do your homework. The other companies are far too overpriced. Thanks again Girls. I travel a lot, however you are my go-to team in the area.

name: Phyllis Payne
text: Angelica led the two-member team who cleaned my home.  It was Angelica's second visit.  She does an outstanding job, is professional, friendly, and knows her work.  CSI did a restoration for me about a year ago.  I was beyond pleased with their work.  It's still top-notch!

name: Jennifer Varnell
text: BEWARE.  I recently had a horrible experience with this company.  I had contracted them to clean very specific parts of a rental I own but when then tenants showed up for move in, the unit was not clean.  Only one item we had agreed to was actually clean.  I then had to go to the townhouse and clean for 2 hours myself so my tenets could move in.  The floors were not swept or mopped, appliances and cabinets not wiped down as agreed. Fans and window sills filthy, even though we discussed doing this in advance and it is outlined on the invoice. I even sent them pictures.  What's worse is that even after I contacted them, they never called me back and still charged my card!  I have disputed this with my credit card company, but what a hassle.  Save yourself the trouble and get a company that will do what is right when they make a mistake. The pictures below are just a small sampling of what it looked like "after" the cleaning!

name: Anna Claire Stinson
text: After a no show from another local cleaner, CSI was able to fit me in at the last minute. The team did an incredible move-in clean and was prompt, professional, and thorough. Alana, the representative I spoke with on the phone, was courteous, friendly, and determined to keeping us on schedule for our move. I highly recommend CSI and will certainly use them in the future.

name: scott pilkington
text: We've been using CSI weekly cleaning sefrvice for at least 10 years and are always very pleased with the job they do. We highly recommend them.

name: Vickie Bolling
text:
I am so impressed with CSI. They're so good and efficient. From the first interaction with them, they are very friendly and informative. I absolutely love Tania and Alyssa--what a team!
My house has a lot of books--done--theyre all dusted. My house is old;they make it look better (cleaning done correctly has that effect). I'm a little bit of a clutterbug--they magically organize the little things like exposed cords, kitchen stuff put where it belongs--what a concept!  Tania and Allysa make things I don't even notice cleaner and better. They're also kind and considerate in my home.

resp.text: Thank you Vickie for your feedback. We absolutely adore you as a customer and hope to keep this relationship for a very long time. Tania and Alyssa have talked about how much they love and appreciate you.

name: Candice Hamilton
text: I have loved working with CSI! We had a pipe burst in our kitchen which sent water into our kitchen, laundry room, living room and dining room. CSI packed us out and moved our furniture back in after our renovations were complete. They sent a cleaning crew to deep clean all of the dust and grit that was stirred up during the renovation process. The ladies that they sent were fabulous!!! They were quick but efficient, and my house looked and smelled amazing. Thank you CSI!!

name: Jessica Torres
text: I highly recommend this company the girls are amazing at what they do ❤️

name: Randy Rogers
text: This company is on time and does a great job. Kelsey is always super nice and does a great job. We request her on every job. I would recommend this company to everybody.

name: Erica Odell
text: I recently had them do a move out clean. Upon walking in I immediately noticed base boards that were not done in several rooms. (This was the main thing I asked them to do). Floors looked swept but not mopped. Windows still filthy. I had to spend several hours cleaning after them keeping me up till midnight the night before I moved. Not worth the almost 300 I spent.

name: Beth Bowman
text: Its amazing what these carpet guys can do. Ours went from stained and gross, to practically spotless. Should have hired them a long time ago!

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Have a working partnership with them. They do great work.

text: I've trusted CSI with my carpet cleaning needs for years, and they continue to exceed my expectations. I've recently used their Maid service for general cleaning. I may never need to clean again! Not only do they GUARANTY their work, but they're honest and they get the job done at an affordable price. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

name: Josh Poole (Pooleus)
text: Our water heater flooded our house, and thankfully CSI took care of us! They responded quickly and did a great job. Rick was friendly and knowledgable. We will call them again for any water damage needs!

text: I LOVE THESE PEOPLE..

text: CSI Cleaning & Restoration did a great job the move in cleaning they did at our new home in Opelika AL. The walls and crown molding were filthy, and CSI made short work of it and all the rest of the kitchen and bathrooms. The carpet cleaning was top notch as well. I tell others about the cleaning service all the time.

name: John Folta
text: I highly recommend this company. They did a great job.

name: Hayden J
text: CSI always does a great job! Love how they clean our house!

name: Katrina Paxson
text: CSI does a great job!  Employees are always friendly and willing to do what is asked of them.

name: Elliott Wood
text: Not impressed. Watched the crew show up in the driveway momentarily and left. Never knocked on the door and never called the contact number I provided.

name: Brandon Marcello
text: Terrible. Spots of house completely skipped by cleaning crew. No idea what they did for five hours other than burn time. They also left my doors and garage door unlocked without notifying me they were finished. Complete waste.

name: Amanda Marcello
text:
Pretty unsatisfied with the 5-hour  "deep clean" service we had today. We hired this company to thoroughly clean a house we just purchased so it would be spotless prior to moving in. Upon arrival to our house this afternoon, right off the bat we noticed they left the garage door up with our belongings in plain view. The front door was unlocked as well. The crew was nowhere to be found.

As we looked around to see what had been done, here are just a few things we noticed:
-soap scum in the shower
-hair in the sink/tubs
-microwave not cleaned
-oven not cleaned
-things on kitchen countertops that would have easily been brushed away even if wiped with a dry cloth

We were supposed to be notified prior to the crew leaving and we weren't. I tried to call the office at 4:30 pm and no one answered.

I am very dissatisfied with the level of service. Book this company at your own risk.

name: Kaylen Anderson
text: We had my Mom's carpets cleaned, and we were very happy with the results!  Her carpets were pretty bad, they exceeding our expectations of how they would turn out.

name: anthony givens
text: Nice people to do business with.

name: Richard Gerberding
text: The service is outstanding.  I am fussy and it meets, if not exceeds my expectations. One of its many virtues is that I do not need to point out what needs to be done; dirt, wherever it is hiding, is found and eliminated without me saying anything or sometimes without me even knowing.  The service is reliable, honest, thorough, and fast.  Very professional in all regards.

name: Kristy Springer
text: I absolutely love when Tate & Co. cleans my home.  It's the best feeling coming home to a fresh and clean house that smells so good. Everything is picked up off the floor and cleaned under, the kitchen is spotless, as well as the showers and the couch pillows are fluffed (the little things mean so much as well) Tate & Co. are very professional and reasonable.  I highly recommend Tate & Co.

text: Tate does a great job, always smells good looks clean. She moves furniture and does a Thorough cleaning under furniture. Does great on kitchen.  And cleaning all appliances and stainless steel. Highly recommended her.

text: She does a very good and through job. I would reccomend her to anyone. She  doesnt cut any corners and will do you right

name: Brett Miller (B.Milla)
text:
Communication & scheduling with MaidPro is simple & easy. Lynn texts & sets everything up, sends reminders, & answers any questions promptly.

My MaidPro professional is Nia, & she is just that; professional. She's punctual, does a wonderful job, & always leaves my place spotless. Never a need for me to correct her or ask her to do something she hasn't done. Very pleasant and polite.

I receive services every other week which basically keeps me limited to spot cleaning/picking up here & there. Can't tell you the last time I held a mop or a toilet wand. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a cleaning service you can trust. 5/5

name: S Hayes
text:
They came back to clean a second time and the floors were still gross.  My daughter took her shoes off and walked around the floor for a bit and the bottom of her feet were black.  When we walked in I could tell the floors had not been cleaned properly because I could see spots and there were little pieces of junk lying around on the floor.  The floors definitely were not mopped.  The remainder of the house looked like it was just quickly done.  I could have done a much better job in deep cleaning.  Not worth it.

I get that the power eventually went off, but your crew arrived in the morning where there was plenty of daylight coming through the windows.  The main floors in the family and dining room were very dirty, like nothing had been done.  Then the remainder of the floors throughout the house were also extremely dirty.  This honestly should still have been an easy clean considering there was literally NOTHING in our house as we had waited to even move in any boxes or furniture until the the floors were done.  The fact that services took place twice and it still was very dirty made me upset.  I have a 5 year old and a 7 month old demanding baby and simply did not have the time to do floors with the limited time frame we had to move out of our previous home and into our new home.  My husband had to work out of town and we have no family here to help with the kids.  So that left me with other choice but to quickly move our belongings into the our new home on filthy floors.  We held off on bringing our belongings into the home so that we could have our floors cleaned.  Now it is going to be even more difficult because we will have to move our belongings around the house and tackle one room at  time just to get the floors cleaned.  All they had to do was a good clean on the floors.

resp.text:
It breaks my heart to read a one star review.  Here at Maidpro we try to provide the best service to our customers.  Unfortunately the person that hired us to do this move out clean only paid for a certain number of hours to clean this home.  We had to come back a second time (free of charge) because the home did not have power the first time.  Again I apologize that you feel like the house was not properly cleaned
if we would have been allowed more time the outcome could have been different.

Tracie

resp.text: Yolanda our records indicate that we left a message on your cell phone on October 21st and did not receive a call back.  Our policy is one call back and if the applicant does not return our phone call we hire the next person.

text: Kristin and her team do an absolutely fantastic job. I have been through several services and individuals and no one has done this good of a job. They were very detailed and thorough. They were extremely friendly and professional. I particularly loved the swan folded towels on my bed and the essential oils scents left in the sinks and in the bathrooms. It makes me feel like I'm in a hotel! I also loved the high quality vacuum cleaners they used. We just had our hardwood floors redone  and I was worried about what cleaning solution to use .  I found Kristen  was much more knowledgeable about my floors and what needed to be used then the flooring company!

resp.text: Thanks Elisabeth your feedback means the world!!

text: Do not work for this company. Owner is disrespectful unprofessional yells at employees you will be expected to do things not apart of your job description ie babysitting not trained properly or long enough, not reinbursed for travel, they will keep your tips AND yes i have the right company dont play stupid

resp.text: I am so sorry but I think you have the wrong company.  First of all we never ask anyone to babysit (all of our kids are grown) , we always reimburse for travel time and would never keep tips.  Are you sure you worked for Maidpro of Birmingham?

name: TaShonda Lewis-Taylor
text: Hired to clean before a party. Wanted floors swept/mopped, 2 rugs vacuumed, a ceiling fan dusted, 2 baths and kitchen cleaned. Prior to moving to Birmingham we had our home regularly cleaned, so we had expectations. They were NOT met.  Cabinets nasty, floors didnt look clean, bath sink dirty, tub dirty and our shower head was broken and set on the side of our tub. But the worse part is when I finally spoke to Linda, all she did was make excuses (even after I provided pictures)!!! The only reason I didn't go off was because I was at work. She had the nerve to say "we didn't know when you asked to have the kitchen cleaned it mean cabinets and baseboards". Did she not read her own website 49 pt checklist???!!! But why would I need to tell you to clean cabinets that you can CLEARLY see need cleaning?! Did I mention she didn't offer to replace our shower head (NOT ONCE). She asked could they come back. For what? I had to go ahead and clean myself before my guests arrived. And I didn't want to give them anymore of my time after she made it evident that this was how she did business. I should have never given them my credit card information until I was satisfied with their work. Now I'm out of $132 for a piss poor cleaning job!

working for us years ago!

text: Nurse's Touch did a fantastic job with our carpets when we were moving out! After years of dirt, grime and drink stains, the carpets looked like new. We also had them do a recliner of ours. text: Ed did an amazing job cleaning our carpets!! He was super thorough and made sure he worked to get every stain up! We have three little ones and they are pretty rough on our carpet but now after Ed cleaned it, it looks brand new!! We won't be using anyone else ;)

text: Called around 3pm and he arrived at 4pm. Very fast service for a work in. Carpet looks brand new!! And wasn't soggy like other companies have your floor.  Very nice and very Reasonable price. Thoroughly satisfied!!!!

text: Great job! Made my carpets look brand new! Got rid of 20-year old stains! Great customer service and fantastic service. Highly recommend! Thanks Ed!

text: Ed and Lesleigh are truly two amazing and very professional people. I am beyond pleased with my services. The were very informative , on time, friendly and just down right great genuine people. I googled around to find a company that could possibly do work on a Sunday. Upon my findings Nurse's Touch came up. I scheduled an appointment with Ed. The day of service came and I received a courtesy call from Lesleigh to inform me that they were in route. When they arrived the greeted with big smiles and a firm handshake. The results are amazing. I truly thank you guys for all of your hard work and I will be sending you more clients.

text: Carpets were so clean... they even cleaned my tile and it looked great. Professional, enthusiastic and thorough.

text: Ed with Nurses Touch did a fantastic job we had our carpets cleaned and our tile  and grout...I highly recommend this company very professional and on time

text: Fast services. Carpet smells fresh and looks great!

name: E. B. Peebles
text: Did a very professional job.

name: Tiffany Anderegg
text: We have been using Mandy's Cleaning Service for ~18 months now and have been consistently impressed by the quality of the service. All of the representatives who have visited our home and performed cleaning services have been very polite and conscientious with their work. I like that you can choose what cleaning products are used in your home; for example, I am very sensitive to bleach, and I never have to worry that I'm going to have to smell it for days after a cleaning! In addition, we have 2 cats and a dog, and Mandy's goes above and beyond to remove almost all traces of pet hair from our rugs and couch. I can't believe how thorough the cleaning is. And then there's all the special touches...from the folds (or even bows!) on the toilet paper to the little Christmas gift that was left with us after this month's cleaning. I highly recommend Mandy's Cleaning Service if you want a beautifully clean home!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review.  We train all our employees to be polite and to do a great job when they arrive to clean your home and all our customers.  The little things we do we love doing and certainly makes a difference.  Thanks for being a loyal customer!

name: Rachel Anderson
text: Mandy's is the best! Personable, trustworthy, detailed. My house always smells so fresh and clean when they're done and looks spotless! They have special touches like organizing my kids stuffed animals in fun ways that they love to see, clean our dark floors better than anyone else has, and always have a smiling face! 10/10

resp.text: Thank you so much.  Floors can be hard and we are very happy your floors come out well!  Thanks for allowing us to clean your home.

name: Natalie Roe
text: Mandy’s is extremely professional, responsive, attentive and easy to work with. They are accommodating and do a great job.

resp.text: Thank you very much!  We work hard to be flexible with our clients.

name: Katie Groom Balloch
text:
I had gifted myself a deep clean of my home for my birthday - and it was a wonderful gift! The team was prompt, efficient, and professional. They were so detail oriented - even folded the ends of the toilet paper and paper towels to a point - like Monica from Friends (haha!). I had hoped for that feeling from commercials were you see the sparkle when you walk in a clean room and you hear the *chime*, and I got it. They really worked as a team; I heard one of the gals ask how to do something, and another gal gave her a suggestion and even checked back to see if it worked. Very detail oriented.

They were also mindful of my working from home and my dog.

My place was cleaner than I even expected. Will recommend to everyone (I’m telling you, it’s Monica Geller clean), and I will definitely gift to myself again!

Shout out to Cierra, Latoya, and Kyla, the team I got. Thank you so very much.

text:
Every detail about this service was exceptional. I have lived in my apartment for six years and let a few things get away from me when cleaning. I've never had someone clean my home before, so was a little nervous about the experience but I was immediately set at ease with the customer service at the office and the Maids who came to my home.
Every inch of my home was clean and I could tell they took their time with the most troublesome spots. Within seconds of opening the door, The Maids were off to work, making the absolute best use of their time. They were very friendly and went above and beyond.  I was very impressed and can't wait to book another cleaning!

text: Came to the house like a foot ball team and got right to it. They left like family walking out the door. Great customer service!!!! Thanks all of you all from the bottom to the top of my family hearts.

name: Christopher Coleman
text:
The only value this place gave me was knowing the value of my Ring camera. The "maids" came into my house stayed for 2 hours, charged $378 and stood around manipulating my thermostat. There were four people that came in, two that actually cleaned, one that stood and made sure the mop in her hand was upright and another that walked around with a vacuum strapped to her back for the entire time (nice hairdo by the way Pam).

The beauty of it was after they "cleaned", they left a note that they mopped three times when I watched them mop half the floor at best. All I can say is if you deal with this farce of a company, make sure you are aware of what you are getting into.

resp.text: Mr. Coleman – Thank you for using The Maids.  My apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our company.  We work hard to provide a professional, quality clean that we stand behind.  In fact, we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee.  I do not see your name in our records.  Please contact our office today, and we will be happy to send someone to your home to take care of anything we may have missed and be certain you’re completely satisfied with our service.  At The Maids, customer service is extremely important to us and we always strive for 100% customer satisfaction.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Kathy Senseman, Owner

My place is cleaned every time as if it is the first time - it is always left spotless. The ladies that clean my place are friendly, courteous, detail-focused, and respectful of my belongings. I get so much peace of mind knowing that the housekeeping is handled and I have more time to focus on other things in life.

The Maids is a very honest and reputable company. I've had a firsthand account of seeing this multiple times and it is a rare and very admirable thing today to see a business work so hard to make sure the client is 100% satisfied...going above and beyond when they didn't have to.

I've looked at other Birmingham cleaning services and none match the level of service and affordability that The Maids provide. I highly recommend The Maids to anyone that wants their home professionally cleaned every time.

name: Erica Lau
text: I scheduled an initial deep cleaning with The Maids, and did not rebook after the first cleaning. Overpriced and cleaning is average. They sent 3 people to clean a 2 bedroom + den apartment and it took over 2 ½ hours. After the cleaning, they called to let me know that they had accidentally gone over by 25 minutes wanted to charge me almost $100 over my initial quote. Needless to say, I have found a great housekeeper who can do all the work, in the same amount of time for ⅓ of the price.

resp.text:
Erica,
The price of our initial cleaning is always based on the size and condition of the property we are cleaning.  We give an estimate over the phone based on the client's information.  We offer a 100% unconditional guarantee.  I so wish you had chosen to have us stop back by if your cleaning was just average.  The Maids handles social security, workman's comp, insurance and bonding, health care, cleaning supplies, etc. therefore we cannot compete on price with individuals who do not have these expenses.  Please call me directly if I can be of assistance in the future.  Kathy Senseman, Owner

The floors were not cleaned  properly and now there is a sticky film on them that wasn't there before. Overall it was not a positive outcome. We were looking for a company to provide continued service that is competent Unfortunately we will be looking elsewhere,  I suggest you do the same. text: I highly recommend Expert Cleaning Concepts! I have used them multiple times since moving into my home over a year ago. The staff is very friendly. What I appreciate most is that they clean as I would.    Small things that matter to me such as wiping my trash can etc are done.  I keep my home rather clean, but they find areas that to clean that some think are minimal.  I’m slightly OCD; so, I notice any and everything that’s not done.  They are the only cleaning service that I use because they are very thorough, and I trust them to get things done. They also have ᵃ loyalty card hat I utilize.  I’m almost on a new card. Thank you all for always helping me out.  I’m certain I will be calling you soon. It’s time for ᵃ deep cleaning with the spring cleaning add ons:)

Mrs. Johnson

text: I am a recent college graduate who resides in Tuskegee, AL (about 20 mins from Auburn). I work two jobs (6 days out of the week) and have been in the process of moving for almost a month now. I want to have my apartment deep cleaned before I move my belongings in. When I called yesterday to set up the appointment, the service award great! Quick and easy to schedule. However today when the appointment was scheduled to take place between 12 and 4 pm,  I received no call to let me know that someone was on their way by 3:30. I called the 334 number twice; no one answered. I went to their website and   contact Sunny, the online chat window saying that no one had contacted me. She said that a representative would be right with me. Someone called maybe ten mins later to say that THEY HAD TO CANCEL THE APPOINTMENT. THEY SAID THAT ONE OF THE CLEANERS HAD A BAD EXPERIENCE IN THE AREA AND WASNT COMFORTBALE COMING OUT. These sentiments are fine and dandy but I WAS GIVEN NO PRIOR NOTIFICATION THAT MY APPONTMENT WAS CANCELLED. Not a good way to conduct business.

name: Joey Butler
text: Tuesday’s are our favorite day of the week because that’s when The Maids come by! Walking in the door after work to a clean house that smells so good is worth every penny. The Maids have been cleaning our house for over 10 years and I can’t imagine trusting anyone else with our house.

resp.text:
Joey,
I am with you that my favorite day of the week is the day that The Maids cleans the house!   Many thanks for trusting us in your home since 2010!   We look forward to making your Tuesdays your favorite day of the week for many years to come!
Kathy Senseman, Owner

name: Alta Finney
text: The girls look and act professional; there is no down time where they are not working very hard. They are polite and respectful; I do not worry about them being in my house. My only complaint is that they don't service Guntersville, or I'd have them clean my parents' house!

resp.text:
Alta,
Thank you for sharing how pleased you are with our team of professionals who take care of your home.  I hope this is giving you more quality time to spend with your parents in Guntersville and you are enjoying spending time on the lake!  Kathy Senseman, Owner

text: Charlotte, Halie and Jennifer did an OUTSTANDING job!!! Fast, efficient and sterling results - it doesn't get any better than that! Plus, the ladies were EXTREMELY courteous. All in all, the best housekeeping experience I've ever had! Well done ladies and Thank You!!

name: Sgt Princess
text: I had my first visit this week & couldn't be happier. The entire team was very professional and friendly. I was able to work in my home-office all morning, which was great and after they were finished, the house was SO CLEAN. Kandis was the team leader & she was very thorough going through my home & asking questions. The cost was reasonable for a 4-team crew and I like the cleaning products that were used.

resp.text: Anita - Thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Happy customers have helped build our business through referring friends and family and online review sharing, so we appreciate that you took the time to share your great experience with others. We look forward to cleaning your home again soon!

name: Karen Bachmeyer
text: I have been using The Maids for almost fifteen years.   They are very flexible to work with and quickly correct any problems I have.   The team is very dependable, polite and efficient.

resp.text:
Karen,

Kathy Senseman, Owner

text: They are in and out -- they have their cleaning down pat! My floors look BEAUTIFUL! It's OBVIOUS they have been here - everything glows! And, IF they do miss something, you leave them a note and they add it to your permanent file!  Amazing!

resp.text: Karen– Thank you for your glowing review of The Maids! Our team will be thrilled to hear them and we all look forward to servicing you again soon!

resp.text: Im sorry that you are disappointed. However, I took care of this complaint. Leslie spent 9 hours there and you were charged 270.  The place was in your own words "beyond nasty" to begin with. She did the best she could in 9 hours and when you complained.. i came back and saw that the house was emucalately cleaned except for some cobwebs.. which i fixed and you agreed there were no more problems with the house or cleaning. And agreed to remove this false review.

text:
Helpful Housekeeping did a "deep clean" for me on Jan 9, 2020.  They were courteous, professional, detail oriented and just plain friendly.
The fact they are licensed, bonded, and insured gave me assurance of legitimacy.
I can't express my appreciation enough for a job well done.

resp.text: Thank you, Dwayne. Your family is so great! I hope this cleaning is an ease to your minds and lightens some burdens.

name: 1968kenpoman
text: Spent to much time in bathroom, and upstairs, was late arriving and never finished the job ,I would not recommend this service.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments. As we discussed, the cleaner was not comfortable remaining in a house of four men that were smoking indoors, nor was she comfortable with you crawling into your bed while she was attempting to clean it. For a woman's perspective, this is not a safe environment and she did the right thing in removing herself from the situation.  You also had no complaints with her cleaning until we refused repeat service. I believe you were offended more than displeased. However, the safety of my cleaners have to come first.

name: Allie Washington
text: Awesome! We had a deep clean done a few weeks before expecting a baby and I couldn’t be happier. It’s the little things that were so helpful, like cleaning the inside of the microwave and oven (these things need to be done but being so pregnant, it wasn’t happening) I would recommend them and their services! Friendly, kind, and do a great job cleaning!

resp.text: Ahh! Thanks. Good luck with your little one!

name: Virginia Williamson
text:
Leslie did a great job!
I highly recommend her and Helpful Housekeeping.
Jolene came out the day we made contact and gave us an estimate. The job was done the next day.

text: I have been very pleased with the Helpful Housekeeping team. The ladies are very friendly, dependable and hard working. Cindy is a sweetheart and does a better job of cleaning my house then I did. I am so grateful.



Review

Carmen Lewis

1 week ago

Helpful Housekeeping has been cleaning our home for over a year now, and we are delighted with the results. As a working mom and wife, it is incredibly nice to be able to come home to a clean house and not have to worry about it! She does ... More

Helpful Housekeeping

Owner · Your reply will be posted soon.

Thank you, Denise. I'm glad we could be part of your recovery. And glad your husband found a 24 foot ladder so we could get to those studio lights and fans in the rafters. Boy, is your ceiling tall!

Edit

name: Carmen Lewis
text: Helpful Housekeeping has been cleaning our home for over a year now, and we are delighted with the results.  As a working mom and wife, it is incredibly nice to be able to come home to a clean house and not have to worry about it!  She does a fantastic job and is incredibly reliable...and the price is very reasonable.  Would highly recommend her.

resp.text: Thank you, Carmen. I appreciate the time you took to create the review. Your words of affirmation mean a lot to me. Thanks for making me a part of your family. I especially loved helping with your luncheon. Maybe I should think about expanding to after party clean-ups.

name: Timothy Hazard
text: Jolene was good.  Mary was better than Jolene the time she cleaned my house without her child.  When Mary brought along her uncontrollable child, my house was dirtier in certain areas (e.g., WALLS) than when I left.  I didn't appreciate the service being changed from Wednesday to Thursday because Jolene said she overcommitted.  I didn't appreciate Jolene informing me (rather than asking me) that Mary would be cleaning, at the last minute.  The final issue for me was the kid who was kicked out of school for the day for being unruly dirtying up my house.  I believe anyone who makes your life better should be tipped well, but my appreciation was not reciprocated.

resp.text: For those who are interested...Children are absolutely NOT allowed on the job. Clients should not tell cleaners they can bring their Austic child to their house and then get upset when they do. Mary made a mistake and we have both apologized. Mary is an extremely good cleaner, very dependable, and trustworthy. I'm sorry that this one experience over shadowed me cleaning up your kitchen after both of your kitchen grease fires for no additional fees, doing extra things like folding your laundry and doing your dishes, etc. No one is perfect. I'm not perfect. Mary is not perfect. None of my cleaners are perfect. But I think we are good people who genuinely want to be helpful to other people. Thanks for your feedback. Good luck in your life.

name: Malorie Thompson
text: jolene is great! always on time. always a great job. very trustworthy!

resp.text: Thanks, Malorie! You are one of the busiest households I clean. I'm glad I've managed to live up to my name...HELPFUL housekeeping.

Don’t hire Molly Maid. They’re a joke. You’ll end up having to repay for a clean.

The bathroom still had my cats food in it that they didn’t sweep. Which means they didn’t mop. Which means they didn’t do ANYTHING as promised.
